laimu is confidently incorrect: Laimu is entirely confident in an answer and it turns out to be incorrect
laimu mentions ferrets: Laimu mentions ferrets at any point
laimu giggles at neuro: Laimu giggles at something Neuro said
laimu can't find country: Laimu can't find a country on the map
laimu is :British:: Laimu references anything British, such as Greggs, does a heavy British accent, knows a UK landmark, or says British slang
laimu does a silly voice: Laimu does a silly voice during stream
